comment.author: 20511393@N02
comment._content: This image was uploaded to the Wikimedia Commons, which is a free media repository and a sister project to Wikipedia. The image is here. It is currently used here in Wikipedia's article about Cambodia. You can keep track of its future use on Wikimedia projects by checking "File usage on other wikis" on the image description page. Thank you for putting it on Flickr!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Glad you used it! We love Wikimedia and have been contributing images from the collections. Deb Wythe Brooklyn Museum
